pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Opinionated Framework for Using 'JavaScript' // Enforces good practice and provides convenience functions to make work with 'JavaScript' not just easier but also scalable. It is a robust wrapper to 'NPM', 'yarn', and 'webpack' that enables to compartmentalize 'JavaScript' code, leverage 'NPM' and 'yarn' packages, include 'TypeScript', 'React', or 'Vue' in web applications, and much more.
